title: Linked
description: Twenty-three-year-old corporate spy Brina Kingston has a new position as billionaire Luke Maxwell’s executive assistant, a space in his bed and his heart, and the one piece of information that could tear his company and their relationship to shreds. Brina has the password to a secret software project Luke is set to unveil at a conference in six weeks. Brina’s employer wants the password. Brina wants Luke.When a series of events puts Brina in the crosshairs of one of her colleagues, Luke’s twenty-ninth birthday party presents the perfect opportunity to blow Brina’s cover. And Brina soon realizes that if she wants to be forgiven she must first forgive herself.
author: Cassia Leo
